name: Wen777.GitHub.io
body:
## About Wen-Hsiang Shih

I'm a back-end developer also a entrepreneur. I have ever pushed a digital product Agilearning to enterprise market with three partners and got two paying customers. One of customers is listed company in Taiwan. 

I'm looking for the following jobs :
- Job with scaling issue, like database scaling, caching (redis), load-balancing (nginx).
- High availability Backend requirement.

### Talk

* [MUPX meets Docker](http://www.meetup.com/Meteor-Taipei/events/226366012/), Meteor Taipei meetup, January 26, 2016
[Slide](http://slides.com/swhsiang/deck-7)

* [Test Meteor on Travis](http://www.meetup.com/Meteor-Taipei/events/226366012/), Meteor Taipei meetup, Nov 18, 2015
[Slide](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1aqIR_NUdfVjbgRUUzCoMz74togrMZQ4yVQE03DfXhNw/edit?usp=sharing)

### Project

* Back-end developer @
#### [Kaneoh](http://www.garageplus.asia/zh/node/964), enterprise solution, 2015/11 - current
Implement a graphql server, a authentication system, and some meteor packages. Also a Slack robot to automatically deploy.

* Back-end developer @
#### [Agilearning](http://agilearning.io/), online coding environment hosting service, 2014/12 - 2015/02
Deployed Agilearning to Google Cloud, Digital Ocean, and Linode. Managed hundreds of containers and dozens of servers.  Also wrote shell script to automatically deploy service. Collaborated with three partners and brought product to market in three months.

* #### [Taiwan Coder League](http://entresoft.org/), student coding group, Teaching Assistant, 2014/09 - 2015/02
TWCL is a nonprofit organization. Founders of TWCL believe that "Software eating the world. Coding is important as same as Math, English, and Science." I joined this project as a teaching assistant and helped more than dozen students debug while there were building their website.

### Education

* #### Department of Communications Engineering, 
Feng Chia University, 2012 - 2014 undergraduate

* #### National Dali Senior High School
2009 - 2012
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
